Package com.example.mini_pekkas

Class Firebase

java.lang.Object
com.example.mini_pekkas.Firebase
public class Firebase extends Object
This class is used to interface with Firebase and should be used for all Firebase operations. Any functions that get and request data needs a user defined listener. This is a function that's called after an operation is completed. Every listener will have a on success and an optional on error listener (if not overwritten, the default error handling is to print the error in the log)

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description

    Firebase.CheckListener
    Interface for functions that check a conditional.

    Firebase.DataRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that retrieve string.
    static interface 
    Firebase.EventRetrievalListener
    Interface for getEvent.
    static interface 
    Firebase.ImageRetrievalListener
    Interface for functions that return an image in Uri format.
    static interface 
    Firebase.InitializationListener
    Interface for functions that initializes data and doesn't return anything

  • Constructor Details

    • Firebase

      public Firebase(android.content.Context context)
      Firebase constructor. Initializes the database and all collection references
      Parameters:
      context - the context of the activity the function is called from

  • Method Details

    • fetchUserDocument

      public void fetchUserDocument(Firebase.InitializationListener listener)
      This function fetches the user document and stores it in UserDocument This function shouldn't need to be called as the constructor will initialize the user document Call checkThisUserExist first if the existence of the user document is not known
      Parameters:
      listener - An InitializationListener listener that runs on a successful fetch

    • checkThisUserExist

      public void checkThisUserExist(Firebase.CheckListener listener)
      Checks if the user document exists in the firestore.
      Parameters:
      listener - A CheckListener listener that is called when the check is complete. Returns true if the document exists

    • InitializeThisUser

      public void InitializeThisUser(User user, Firebase.InitializationListener listener)
      Initializes this user into firebase
      Parameters:
      user - A user object to be initialized
      listener - An InitializationListener listener that is called after the user is initialized

    • getThisUser

      public User getThisUser()
      Gets and returns a User object stored in UserDocument
      Returns:
      the user document as a User object. Throws an error if the user does not exist

    • updateThisUser

      public void updateThisUser(User user, Firebase.InitializationListener listener)
      Updates the user document with the new user object
      Parameters:
      user - a user object with new data to be updated
      listener - Optional InitializationListener listener that is called after the user is updated

      public void deleteThisUser(Firebase.InitializationListener listener)
      Deletes this user, essentially starting with a clean slate also deletes related documents in user-events collection
      Parameters:
      listener - Optional InitializationListener listener that is called after the user is deleted

    • organizeEvent

      private void organizeEvent(Event event, Firebase.InitializationListener listener)
      This function is called whenever an event is created. Sets this user as the organizer
      Parameters:
      event - an event object that's being organized
      listener - Optional InitializationListener listener that is called after the event is organized

      public void waitlistEvent(Event event, Firebase.InitializationListener listener)
      Waitlist this user into the event. Creates a new entry in the user-events collection
      Parameters:
      event - an event object to be waitlisted into
      listener - Optional InitializationListener listener that is called after the event is waitlisted

      listener - A DataRetrievalListener listener that returns the status of the user in the event

    • uploadProfilePicture

      private void uploadProfilePicture(User user, android.net.Uri image, Firebase.DataRetrievalListener listener)
      A private function that stores the profile picture in the storage. This function is called from uploadProfilePicture and should not be invoked directly
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to store the profile picture in
      image - the image to be stored in Uri format
      listener - Optional listener that is called when the image is stored. Returns the image url as a string

    • uploadProfilePicture

      private void uploadProfilePicture(User user, android.net.Uri image)
      Overload of the uploadProfilePicture(User, Uri, DataRetrievalListener) with no listener

    • setProfilePicture

      public void setProfilePicture(User user, android.net.Uri image, Firebase.DataRetrievalListener listener)
      Stores the profile picture in the storage. Listener is required This function automatically handles the updating of the profile picture in the user object
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to store the profile picture in
      image - the image to be stored in Uri format
      listener - Optional DataRetrievalListener listener that is called when the image is stored. Returns the image url as a string

    • setProfilePicture

      public void setProfilePicture(User user, android.net.Uri image)
      Overload of the setProfilePicture(User, Uri, DataRetrievalListener) with no listener

    • getProfilePicture

      public void getProfilePicture(User user, Firebase.ImageRetrievalListener listener)
      Gets the profile picture from the storage.
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to get the profile picture from
      listener - the listener that is called when the image is retrieved. Returns the image as a Uri

    • setPosterPicture

      private void setPosterPicture(Event event, android.net.Uri image, Firebase.DataRetrievalListener listener)
      A private function that stores the banner picture in the storage.
      Parameters:
      event - the event object to store the banner picture in
      image - the image to be stored in Uri format
      listener - Optional listener that is called when the image is stored. Returns the image url as a string

      Stores the poster picture in the storage. Listener is required This function automatically handles the updating of the poster picture in the event object
      Parameters:
      event - the event object to store the poster picture in
      image - the image to be stored in Uri format
      listener - the listener that is called when the image is stored. Returns the image url as a string

      Parameters:

    • isThisUserAdmin

      public void isThisUserAdmin(Firebase.CheckListener listener)
      Checks if this user is an admin
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener that is called when the check is complete. Returns true if the user is an admin
